version_description: Bug fixes and performance improvement.

Here’s what’s new in this version of StoryBoost:

- 10 stunning new Story templates
- a few bug fixes

Have questions or feedback about StoryBoost? We’d love to hear from you: StoryBoost.support@lightricks.com

We’re excited to announce that StoryBoost is now up and running on iOS13! Here’s what else is in this update:

1. We’re now fully functional in Dark Mode
2. There is a fresh, new batch of stunning Story templates
3. We’ve fixed a few small bugs

Have questions or feedback from the StoryBoost team? We’d love to hear from you: storyboost.support@lightricks.com.

Today’s update will have your Stories video ready *and* Halloween ready! Here’s what’s new:

1. We now have full audio support - the sound in your videos will be pitch perfect
2. We’ve added a new batch of stunning templates, including a brand new Halloween category so that you can start planning your spooky content!
3. We’ve fixed a few small bugs on iOS13

Have questions or feedback for the StoryBoost team? We’d love to hear from you: storyboost.support@lightricks.com.

The StoryBoost team has a small and mighty update for you! Here's what's new:

1. We've added 22 brand new Story templates, each with several pages included.
2. There are 15 new stickers and 32 new GIFs to make your Stories stand out.
3. We've fixed a few small bugs and made performance improvements.

Enjoy! If you've got feedback or questions for us, we'd love to hear from you: storyboost.support@lightricks.com

We've got an exciting update for you! Sometimes, you want to create Stories but don't have the perfect photo. We're thrilled to announce that in this update, we've integrated with Unsplash, giving all StoryBoost users access to a *huge* library of free, high-quality stock photos from within the app!

And here's what else is new:
- We've added a Seasonal category to help you get started on your holiday content
- 17 fresh, new templates -- including some for Thanksgiving, Black Friday, and Cyber Monday
- 5 new stickers to make your Stories stand out
- 12 brand new animated transitions to put between Story pages and keep your followers tapping through

Enjoy! As always, if you have any feedback or questions for the StoryBoost team, we'd love to hear from you: storyboost.support@lightricks.com

StoryBoost users, we’ve got an exciting update for you! Here’s what’s new:

- Text animation! Type your copy and then make it move.
- 8 brand new templates and 21 new stickers, most of which are for the Holiday Season!
- 26 fun, new GIFs.
- 15 new Retro style layouts.

Enjoy! As always, if you have any feedback or questions for the StoryBoost team, we'd love to hear from you: storyboost.support@lightricks.com

We've got a new look just in time for the new year! You'll notice some app interface changes, but it's still the same StoryBoost that you know and love.
Here's what else is new:

* You can now preview your Story before you share it
* We've added more of the good stuff, and a lot of it is Christmas themed: 19 new templates, 37 new stickers, and 49 new gifs

Enjoy! As always, if you have any feedback or questions for the StoryBoost team, we'd love to hear from you: storyboost.support@lightricks.com

If you’re all about Stories that make everyone stop scrolling you’ll want to check out what’s new on StoryBoost!

- “New” Category. Now you can find fresh & stylish templates the minute they’re out.
- “Try These” Category. Discover the templates you haven’t used yet and make every Story an original work of art
- 26 new stickers to make your Story pop. Let cupid get you good with our irresistible Valentine’s Day stickers
- Small bug fixes and flow improvements for a faster and easier way to stardom

Enjoy! As always, if you have any feedback or questions for the StoryBoost team, we'd love to hear from you: storyboost.support@lightricks.com

If you’re all about Stories that make everyone stop scrolling you’ll want to check out what’s new on StoryBoost!

- New category: Trending - stay up-to-date with the most popular templates and make every Story 100% stylish.
- Favorites - touch & hold on your favorite layouts to pick the ones you like and create a personal collection.
- 28 new templates.
- Valentine’s Day gifs to keep cupid starstruck.
- Small bug fixes for all of our instagrammers out there.

Enjoy! As always, if you have any feedback or questions for the StoryBoost team, we'd love to hear from you: storyboost.support@lightricks.com

A new logo, a new name - and a brand new social game: Check out all the recent updates to Seen:

- Presenting Seen: the app that makes every Story seen, heard - and totally adored!
- “For You” Category: This is your own personalized one-stop-shop, where customized templates will help you keep your own sense of style and unique consistency. Scroll through new templates, designs that are so right for you, special seasonal templates and a trending section.
- “All Templates” section for Story buffs who love to dig deeper in search for rare layouts.
- Animated thumbnails: get a glimpse of every template to help you choose the best fit.
- Gradient Tab: choose a background to your Stories from a wide range of 26 gradients (or you can still stick to the classic single-color backdrops).
- 23 new templates.

Enjoy! As always, if you have any feedback or questions for the Seen team, we'd love to hear from you: seen.support@lightricks.com
